data.thought: S44|H|S40|Hybrid Phenotype H4: 'Autonomous Research Agent'. Combines: Multi-system (C2 research) + Meta (D1 generator) + Swarm (A1 research swarm). Task: 'Understand X and produce comprehensive report'. Notebooks: (1) Query planner - decomposes into sub-questions (2) Web researcher - Firecrawl + Context7 (3) Fact checker - validates claims (4) Synthesizer - integrates findings (5) Report generator - produces artifacts. Observable: research graph, source credibility, synthesis reasoning. Emergent: research assistant that rivals human analysts.
